title: LF someone Who can help me with macro's for Lobby chat for calling positions.
body:
Hi all!

Looking for someone who knows how to make macros in programs like autohotkey, for calling positions from the clients lobby chat. Im not the fastest typer by any means, but some fellow told me about a macro he uses to call spots.

If anyone can help me throw me a post or an add, id appreciate it :)

!NOTE!
On a side note if this isn't bannable or anything like that, im unsure of the rules on this subject. If it is please let me know and ill cease all thought of it.

replies.body: Its was an example, I could do that but im naturally lazy and have a mouse with 12 buttons so why not bind some things to them and use them ingame, for instance, telling your team  a summ spell is down, you know stuff like that.

Why don't you just type it into a chat and copy & paste it like i do :D 
Have your spot ready to paste and have the next spot typed into the chat already... 

so all u have to do is ctrl+v when u get into match select..

and click on the chat screen, ctrl+a, ctrl+x, click back to match select, ctrl+v if u miss out on your first choice.
It isn't hard to type 3 letters, anyway it's based on pick order so who cares.
